<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>pm_project_task</collection> <condition>JSUtil.notNil(current.assignment_group)</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="pm_project_task">phase_type=agile^assignment_groupVALCHANGES^ORstart_dateVALCHANGES^ORend_dateVALCHANGES^EQ<item display_value="Agile" endquery="false" field="phase_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="agile"/> <item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="start_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="end_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Validate Agile Phase</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
checkIfOverlappingWithOtherAgilePhase(current);
})(current, previous);
function checkIfOverlappingWithOtherAgilePhase(phase){ var overlappingPhases = new GlideRecord('pm_project_task'); overlappingPhases.addQuery('phase_type','agile'); overlappingPhases.addQuery('parent',phase.parent); overlappingPhases.addQuery('sys_id','!=',phase.sys_id); overlappingPhases.addQuery('assignment_group',phase.assignment_group); overlappingPhases.addQuery('start_date','<=', phase.end_date); overlappingPhases.addQuery('end_date', '>=', phase.start_date); overlappingPhases.query(); if(overlappingPhases.getRowCount() > 0){ gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Cannot create phase overlapping with other agile phase for same team')); phase.setAbortAction(true); } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-10-01 09:50:41</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>12f6ff0293320200ea933007f67ffb86</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Validate Agile Phase</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">3331d11d93f08210b31a30dcebba1023</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_12f6ff0293320200ea933007f67ffb86</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-11-24 15:47:47</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=12f6ff0293320200ea933007f67ffb86"/> </record_update>
